title: Pixelphone doesn't work in Syria
content:
Hallo 
my Friend have bought a Pixel XL phone in EU, which was working brilliantly in Europe, but when he went to his hometown in Syria Damascus, Pixel stopped connecting to any Wifi ? it says, google cant make a connection !! 

I have expected Google services , Snapshot , etc not to work as it should , but not to be able to make an Wifi connection is very bad !! 

is it  normal , or he is missing sth !?

Greetings
